name: Neutral File Format
summary: Learn about .NFF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NFF files are used for testing rendering algorithms and efficiency schemes. Although not needed for testing, NFF files may also include aesthetic object properties, such as color.

description: Generic 3D geometric design format developed in the 1990s; based on a "minimal scene description language," which describes the geometry and surfaces of objects, including the lighting placement and viewing angle.
